movie.title: Taking Chance
movie.plot: Lt. Col. Michael Strobl, a volunteer military escort accompanies the body of Lance Cpl. Chance Phelps to his hometown in Wyoming.
movie.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 27 nominations.
